name: MyHotel-TheVoiceAutomatedConcierge
0:
”Alexa ask My Hotel for more towels”
”Alexa ask My Hotel what time is checkout”
”Alexa ask My Hotel to send housekeeping”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my hotel
des: You can use My Hotel to interact with Amazon Echo devices installed in your hotel room. You can ask for housekeeping, for more towels, and to inquire about checkout time. New abilities will be added on a continuous basis.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
